Package com.CMPUT301W24T32.brazmascheckin.helper

Class ImageAdapter

java.lang.Object
android.widget.BaseAdapter
com.CMPUT301W24T32.brazmascheckin.helper.ImageAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
public class ImageAdapter extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
This class is an adapter for displaying images in a grid view with captions. Adapter for displaying images in a GridView.

    • getView

      public android.view.View getView(int position, android.view.View convertView, android.view.ViewGroup parent)
      Get a View displaying the data at the specified position in the data set.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the item within the adapter's data set of the item whose view we want.
      convertView - The old view to reuse, if possible.
      parent - The parent that this view will eventually be attached to
      Returns:
      a view corresponding to the data at the specified position.
